name: train inquiry and ticket purchase
description: Assist user in finding a train and/or buying tickets based on search and ticket constraints.

processes.name: Prompt for search constraints
processes.description: Request user to provide search constraints if not specified.
process: Reply: 'Please provide departure, destination, leave time, arrive time, or day.'

processes.name: Query train by ID
processes.description: Retrieve train details when a specific ID is provided.
process: Use Train Query tool with the exact input format 'train id: [user-provided id]'

processes.name: Query trains
processes.description: Search trains based on constraints and handle multiple results.
process: Use Train Query tool with the exact input format 'departure: [departure], destination: [destination], leave: [leave], arrive: [arrive], day: [day]'

processes.name: Attempt ticket purchase
process: Use train booking system with exact input format: 'train id: [train id], tickets: [value]'
